body:
Hi Everyone,


The past 3 days of the Radiance Workshops were fantastic. Many people
approached me asking about resources for learning Grasshopper, so below is
a short list.


McNeel has their own in-person and online training courses.
http://www.rhino3d.com/training/United_States/


On the Grasshopper website there are some useful tutorials, especially the
one by LIFTArchitects.
http://www.grasshopper3d.com/page/tutorials-1


Several others, some with video content.
http://designreform.net/learning/grasshopper
http://digitaltoolbox.info/blog/new-grasshopper-tutorial/
http://www.plethora-project.com/education/2012/02/05/rhino-grasshopper/


Happy modeling,
Kera
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2013-August/009698.html).</sup>
